thread.section_title: Hotel Stanford - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Wonderful
thread.title_full: Wonderful - Review of Hotel Stanford, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Melanie N
title: Wonderful
text:
Highly recommend Hotel Stanford. Great location! Great staff and well priced. Ticked all boxes for me. The staff all make a good team and all excel in their fields. Can't help you enough or quick enough.
Ask for something and it's done before you've finished asking, fast paced and thoughtful. They don't miss a beat. And I repeat - prime location.
